Class Trade

java.lang.Object
quacooker.trading.Trade
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShortTrade
public class Trade extends Object
The Trade class represents a generic trade of an asset, including the asset being traded, the number of shares, purchase price, and the trading fee. It also provides methods to sell the asset, calculate the value of the trade, and retrieve various trade details such as the selling price and date.

  • Constructor Details

    • Trade

      public Trade(String asset, double shares, double purchasePrice, LocalDate purchaseDate)
      Constructs a new Trade object with the given asset, shares, purchase price, and purchase date.
      Parameters:
      asset - The asset being traded (e.g., a stock, cryptocurrency, etc.).
      shares - The number of shares or units of the asset being traded.
      purchasePrice - The price at which the asset was purchased.
      purchaseDate - The date on which the trade was executed.

  • Method Details

    • getAsset

      public String getAsset()
      Gets the asset being traded.
      Returns:
      The asset being traded.

    • getShares

      public double getShares()
      Gets the number of shares or units of the asset being traded.
      Returns:
      The number of shares or units of the asset.

    • getPurchasePrice

      public double getPurchasePrice()
      Gets the purchase price of the asset.
      Returns:
      The purchase price of the asset.

    • getPurchaseDate

      public LocalDate getPurchaseDate()
      Gets the purchase date of the trade.
      Returns:
      The purchase date of the trade.

    • isSold

      public boolean isSold()
      Checks if the asset has been sold.
      Returns:
      true if the asset has been sold, false otherwise.

    • sell

      public void sell(double sellingPrice, LocalDate sellingDate)
      Sells the asset at the given selling price and date. This method also updates the trading fee and calculates the revenue from the trade.
      Parameters:
      sellingPrice - The price at which the asset was sold.
      sellingDate - The date on which the asset was sold.

    • calculateValue

      public double calculateValue(double currentPrice)
      Calculates the value of the trade, which is the difference between the purchase and selling prices (or current price if not sold yet), multiplied by the number of shares, minus the trading fee.
      Parameters:
      currentPrice - The current price of the asset. This is used if the trade has not been sold yet.
      Returns:
      The value of the trade.

    • getSellingPrice

      public double getSellingPrice()
      Gets the selling price of the asset. This value is only set if the asset has been sold.
      Returns:
      The selling price of the asset, or 0 if the asset has not been sold.

    • getSellingDate

      public LocalDate getSellingDate()
      Gets the selling date of the asset. This value is only set if the asset has been sold.
      Returns:
      The selling date of the asset, or null if the asset has not been sold.

    • getTradingFee

      public double getTradingFee()
      Gets the total trading fee associated with the trade.
      Returns:
      The trading fee for the trade.
